nodes.text: Kara Corlon was a Chiss female who lived during the Galactic Civil War. She was a hunter who resided on Kashyyyk in Etyyy with a group of Arcona.

Kara Corlon was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
